content.rendered:
Directed by Fellini T.P.

Written by Vini Vishwa Lal.

Cast Tovino Thomas(Bineesh Damodar). Suraj Venjaramoodu(Madhu (as Suraaj Venjarammoodu)). Saiju Kurup(Vijith). Samyuktha Menon(Devi). Jaffer Idukki(Grocery Shop Owner). Surabhi Lakshmi(Vishalam). Vijilesh Karayad(Libash (as Vijilesh)). Shammi Thilakan(Balachandran). Rajesh Sharma(Damodaran). Muhammed Musthafa(Imbachikoya (as Musthafa)). Anandbbal(Doctor (as Anand Bal)). Aneesh Gopal(Saffer). Bibin Perumbillikunnel(Rasputin). Sudheesh(Sugunan). Bindhu Jayan(Member). Neena Kurup(Shylaja). Shaji Nadesan(Kalari Ashan (as Shaji Natesan)). Manu Pillai(Manu aka Shwanan). Sumangal(Sanju).Aiden Paul. Subeesh Sudhi(D. Narayanan). Mithun Nalini(Suseej). Vini Viswalal(Shanavas). Sanil Shanavas(Manu (Child)). Manidas Payyoli(Beggar). Nidhinraj(Safar (Child)). Nivi Viswalal(Bob Marley). Maheen(Bineesh (Child)). Davia Mary(Devi (Child))

Language Malayalam.

Producers Midhun Abraham. Arya. Dinesh S. Devan. Kilimanoor Sanu. Viswanath. Viswanath I.

Production August Cinema.
